channel.title: Color IDs
channel.description:
Hey, does anyone have a download link for a list of color IDs for Item Integers? For instance, 950 would be red (I don't actually know the ID for red, just an example). I would really appreciate them. I also want to know what number to change in the integers for an item. I know that 2 of the lines mean the colors of the item, so what numbers do I change to change the color of an item.
Thanks ~ Dai

item.title: Color IDs
item.dc:creator: @Tatemo Tatemo
item.description:
@Tatemo wrote:

That might be if they are edited? Like customs wont work cause u can rename the colours and stuff. You cant recolour customs because they dont have all the colours in them only the ones u use which is why u can make them look better than runescape ones

Read full topic

item.title: Color IDs
item.dc:creator: @r_r_r r r r
item.description:
@r_r_r wrote:

Most of the times what Tatemo said is correct. But sometimes I have found ones that are the wrong number.

Read full topic

item.title: Color IDs
item.dc:creator: @Tatemo Tatemo
item.description:
@Tatemo wrote:

The colour ids are the numbers after mat(Numbers here) in MQO on Runescape models im pretty sure.

Read full topic
